item.title: Book of Dooms
item.description: An Archivist’s Prologue: The full magnitude of the Book of Dooms has not been preserved over time. The small fragments and verses contained within this text are considered to be some the most important, or at least, the most well-preserved.

item.title: Book of Light
item.description: Whimsy Avast ye merry people of the land, the world, and the sky. The world arises, opens, and unfolds into our gaping grasp.

item.title: Lani'okaja Theses
item.description: Thesis of the Air From nothing, came Akalani. The air appeared, and Akalani took form. The embodiment of the new, the embodiment of change.

item.title: Peto'ns Dictation
item.description: The world here is to confuse you. Each faith has only fragments of the truth. Join our [[Petoism]], join our fold.

item.title: Stalnir's Word
item.description: Come to the point of Convergence Where the storm and the north meet I come to you in private I am Stalnir, Lord of Light

item.title: Tom's Foolery
item.description: Heyo! Welcome to the Tom’s Foolery Wiki! I’ll be publishing notes to this wiki usually after every session, depending on what you guys have found.
